description:
Learn wing chun from home in a fun and easy-to-follow way!

Wing Chun Kid is Born and trained in Hong Kong, the birth center of Yip Man's Wing Chun.
He is also trained in Jeet Kune Do and Brazilian Jiu Jitsu.
He has taken the best techniques and concepts from different wing chun streams and refined them into a single, concise and brutally effective form that has been proven and tested to work in real life.

The Chum Kiu Form - "Seeking the Bridge" (Wing Chun's 2nd form)
Step-by-step video instructions on how to do the movements and techniques, so you can learn from home!

Easy-to-follow, detailed explanations on finer points of the form, so you can do them properly!

Learn exactly how to use each technique in a real fight, including:
•Double Gum Sau
•Dai Bong Sau
•Double Tan Sau
•Bong Sau / Wu Sau
•Wang Tek
•Double Lan Sau
•Jing Jeung, Palm Strikes
•Kop Sau
•lap Sau

And many more!
title: Wing Chun for Beginners 2 - Learn Martial Arts KungFu
